entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 this morning then west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
